column2: We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Training Specialist to lead our Training and Development Department.The Training Specialist will be responsible for designing, implementing, and evaluating training programs that enhance the skills and knowledge of our employees.         Essential Duties and Responsibilities         Develop Training Programs:         Identify training needs within the organization based on employee skill gaps and business objectives.         Design and develop comprehensive training programs, curriculum, and materials for various topics such as Project Management, Tools, Sales, Behavioral training, Leadership trainings and trainings as per business needs         Bridge the gaps between technical experts and operational levels training targets         Training Delivery and Facilitation:         Deliver engaging and interactive training sessions to employees using a variety of instructional techniques and technologies.         Coordinate and schedule training sessions, ensuring availability of resources and appropriate facilities.         Collaborate with subject matter experts and trainers to ensure accurate and up-to-date training content.         To develop training content, presentations (based on inputs from SMEs), gamification of training programs, etc.         Training Evaluation and Improvement:         Evaluate the effectiveness of training programs through assessments, surveys, and feedback mechanisms.         Analyze training metrics and data to identify areas for improvement and make recommendations for modifications to training programs.         Continuously update and enhance training materials and methodologies to align with industry best practices.         To develop training certificates, rewards         Training Coordination and Administration:         Serve as the primary point of contact for employees regarding training inquiries, registrations, and logistics.         Maintain training records and documentation, ensuring accurate and up-to-date training records for compliance purposes.         Collaborate with internal stakeholders to identify external training opportunities and manage relationships with training vendors and consultants.         To make the reports on trainings and showcase to management on monthly basis         Training Needs Analysis and Planning:         Conduct regular training needs assessments to identify skill gaps and develop training plans accordingly.         Work closely with department managers and team leads to align training initiatives with organizational goals and individual development plans.         Stay abreast of industry trends and advancements in training and development to ensure training programs are relevant and effective.           Qualifications and Skills:         Bachelor s degree in Human Resources/ Training and Development, or a related field. Relevant certifications in training and development are a plus.         Proven experience as a Training Specialist, Training Coordinator, or in a similar role, preferably within the IT industry.         Strong knowledge and understanding of instructional design principles, training methodologies, and adult learning theories.         Excellent facilitation and presentation skills, with the ability to engage and motivate participants.         Proficiency in using various training delivery methods, tools, and technologies.         Exceptional organizational and project management skills with the ability to handle multiple training initiatives simultaneously.         Analytical mindset with the ability to collect and analyze training data and make data-driven decisions.         Strong interpersonal and communication skills to effectively collaborate with stakeholders at all levels.         Flexibility and adaptability to accommodate changing training needs and priorities.
column11: Training, Training delivery, Instructional design, Analytical, Project management, Training need analysis, E-commerce, Training and Development, Operations, Logistics

column2: Job Title:  Sales   Trainer Employment Type:  Full Time Location:  Noida Roles & Responsibilities: Develop a deep understanding of the company's goals, values, and culture to design training programs that align with organisational objectives. Collaborate with Category managers and subject matter experts to identify training needs and priorities. Design and deliver engaging and interactive training sessions, workshops, and materials using a variety of instructional techniques and formats. Create and maintain training materials, including presentations, manuals, videos, and online resources. Evaluate the effectiveness of training programs through assessments, surveys, and feedback, and make adjustments as necessary to improve outcomes. Develop and implement onboarding training programs for new alliances to ensure a smooth transition and accelerate time-to-productivity. Stay informed about industry trends, best practices, and new technologies in training and development, and incorporate relevant advancements into training programs. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Training and Development, Human Resources, Education, Business Administration, or a related field (Master's degree preferred). Proven experience as a Training Manager or similar role, with a minimum of 5 years in designing and delivering training programs. Strong understanding of adult learning principles, instructional design methodologies, and training evaluation techniques. Excellent communication, presentation, and facilitation skills, with the ability to engage and inspire diverse audiences. Demonstrated leadership and project management abilities, with a track record of leading successful training initiatives from concept to implementation. Proficiency in learning management systems (LMS), e-learning authoring tools, and other training technology platforms. Ability to work effectively both independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced, dynamic environment. Certification in training and development (e.g., CPLP, CPTM) is a plus.

column2: Position Summary: The NetSuite?Education Consultant?means  having to work collaboratively with the customer to ensure that they  have the knowledge to achieve their business objectives at the highest  level of success. This is done by leading and conducting various  learning opportunities: Advising customers on learning strategies Delivering tailored end user training sessions Online Webinars Upskilling Partners Online Workshops The role of Education Consultant is primarily focused on  delivering advising sessions which are aimed to provide guidance and  support to the customer by matching training needs to eLearning  solutions in the learning platform, providing user adoption tools and  explanations for effective organization roll out, and developing custom  Learning Action Plans and strategy for proper execution of live end user  training events.? The Education Consultant is also tasked to design and deliver  high-quality, process-based tailored training that promotes NetSuite  best practices to multiple customers in various industries. They will  also deliver public webinars focused on enabling customers on beginner  and/or advanced topics to provide clarity and?guidance on how to  maximize NetSuite processes and functions. The Education Consultant collaborates with NetSuite  Professional Services implementation teams to assess customer training  needs, develop custom agendas and materials (written and eLearning  tutorials), and deliver quality training to ensure optimal user  adoption.?Education Consultants may deliver additional services such as  Train the Trainer, Pre-UAT Training, and Post Go-Live Support Training.? Training project team members, administrators and developers is  also an integral part of our charter and essential to customer success.  Public courses are taught using standard materials and taught using a  standard demo database. Dedicated sessions may be tailored to the need  of the client and may be taught using the customer environment. The ideal candidate possesses a passion for training, has  excellent communication skills, can deliver training sessions, can  develop learning and reference materials, demonstrates excellent  attention to detail, cares deeply about customer satisfaction, exhibits  strong project management skills and embraces change. Your Responsibilities: As an Education Consultant,?you will have the opportunity to make immediate contributions to the organization as you: Understand the NetSuite application in all functional areas as they relate to customer learning requirements Learn all relevant aspects of current and new product  rollouts to ensure ongoing improvement of product knowledge, training  and presentation skills, and technical knowledge Lead and conduct advising sessions to provide guidance and develop strategies to match and achieve customer business needs Deliver customer specific end-user training including  Pre-UAT, Train the Trainer, End User Training, and Go Live Support based  on their implementation project scope onsite and virtually Deliver webinars and webinar series general customer base Work in partnership with the customer to understand areas  where additional support may be required to reinforce their learning  needs? Recommend business best practices from a user adoption, training, and business management perspective Partner with Customer Success Project Managers and Functional  Consultants to develop and deliver user adoption and training plans for  customer implementations Incorporate learning industry best practices and techniques in daily engagements Apply expert knowledge of the NetSuite application to solve the customers business challenge. Create a change management and user adoption strategy Develop customer-specific end-user training and reference  materials (print and eLearning), leveraging NetSuite Universal Content  Library assets Assume full ownership for the success of multiple concurrent  customer training projects and deliver on time and on budget with the  flexibility to manage a changing schedule of differing complexities with  ease, grace, and some management oversight. Mentor others on delivery strategies and internal processes  related to job ownership and execution of the training. Provide  constructive feedback to the Mentees and provide insight on progress to  Manager Adhere to Education Services Delivery methods, processes,  procedures, and policies in the development and delivery of training  services Participate in the development of new offerings and  improvement to processes, providing feedback and suggestions to  education program management Preferred Qualifications: Minimum 2 years in the technology or training delivery industry 1+ years experience in a functional training role with  emphasis on technology and business process training development,  design, and delivery Bachelor's degree in Business Administration/Management,  Finance/Economics, Psychology, Human Resource Management, Education or  Liberal Arts Understanding of common industry standards as related to ERP  along with standard business practices as related to Accounting  (Accounts Receivable, Accounts Payable, General Ledger, Invoicing),  Sales Force Management, (Opportunity, Proposal, Sales Orders,  Forecasting, Territory Management and Quotas), Inventory Management  (Purchasing and Fulfillment) as well as support (Cases Management and  Territory Management). Ideally, industry experience in one or more of  our industry verticals Intelligent, motivated, and competitive with a "roll-up-the-sleeves" and "get the job done" attitude Strong presentation, training, and group facilitation skills,  familiar and competent with audience-engagement methods and techniques  appropriate for all types of audiences Ability to drive value with customers Excellent time management skills with the ability to juggle multiple demands and reprioritize as customer timelines shift Highly adaptable and open to change so that one may best serve customer's needs Excellent written and verbal English skills that can be  applied to documentation development, curriculum review, delivery, and  communication The initiative, creativity, and a passion for delivering results that make a difference Thrive on working in a fast-paced environment Effective when working independently and in team environments Receptive to feedback Role & responsibilities   Preferred candidate profile   Perks and benefits

column2: As a Transformer Services Tendering Specialist, you will play a critical role in the tendering process for transformer services     You will work closely with the sales and project management teams to prepare and submit competitive bids and proposals for transformer services projects         Your primary responsibilities will include:             Tender Preparation: Collaborate with the sales team to understand client requirements, project scope, and technical specifications for    transformer services. This includes reviewing client tender documents, drawings, and specifications to develop a comprehensive    understanding of the project.     Cost Estimation: Conduct a detailed analysis of project requirements, including equipment, materials, labor, and any additional services or subcontracting needed. Prepare accurate cost estimates for the project, accounting for all relevant factors, such as transportation, permits,   and contingency plans. Proposal     Development: Based on the gathered information and cost estimation, develop comprehensive and competitive proposals for transformer    services. This includes outlining project timelines, deliverables, and pricing, ensuring alignment with client expectations and needs.     Supplier and Subcontractor Management: Coordinate and collaborate with vendors, suppliers, and subcontractors to obtain competitive pricing and ensure their ability to meet project requirements and timelines. Evaluate and select the appropriate suppliers and subcontractors in consultation with the project management team.     Compliance and Documentation: Ensure compliance with all client requirements, industry standards, and regulations in the tendering process. Maintain accurate and up-to-date documentation of all tender-related activities, including bid documentation, pricing updates, and communication records.     Communication and Coordination: Collaborate with the sales and project management teams to align on project strategies, schedules, and deliverables. Act as a liaison between the company and potential clients during the tendering process, addressing their queries, and providing necessary information.     Risk review: Provides information to the risk review process in accordance with Hitachi Energy Ltd. policy and sometimes participates in the risk review assessment.     Lost proposals: Performs lost proposal analysis, identifies potential cause, and recommends future actions in cooperation with Sales/Local Business Unit to obtain better future results.
column11: Tender preparation, Sales, Bidding, Compliance, Project management, Consulting, Project accounting, Manager Technology, Cost estimation, Proposal development

column2: About   us We are  Powerplay,  Indias 1st mobile app for construction. In simple words, its the "Slack for Construction Industry". It replaces WhatsApp groups and helps the contractors to collect money faster by improving their site-to-office communication. Founded by IIT Roorkee alumni -  Iesh   Dixit   an d  Shubham   Goyal .  Backed by industry experts and  leading   VCs  like Sequoia, Accel, and India Quotient. Why   join   Powerplay We are on a mission to empower construction workers with great design and technology to fasten Indian infrastructure development. The second largest industry in India - Construction is making a transition from pen and paper to digital, on Powerplay. So, if you want to help and impact the 16% working population of India employed in construction, you will love to work here. Also, each and every person who joins Powerplay absolutely loves what they do. Time just passes for us when we work. We believe that is the only way to do great work. If you resonate with this, come join us! About   the   Role We are seeking a dynamic and enthusiastic individual to join our team as a Product Trainer. As a Product Trainer, you will play a crucial role in educating and empowering our office and site team members on how to effectively utilize our Construction SaaS Project Management Product. Responsibilities - Develop and deliver comprehensive training programs for both office and site team members, ensuring they have a thorough understanding of our product's features and functionalities. - Collaborate with the product development team to stay updated on new features and enhancements, incorporating them into training materials as needed. - Conduct on-site training sessions for site team members, providing hands-on guidance and support. - Create engaging training materials, including presentations, manuals, and videos, to facilitate learning and retention. - Assess training needs and tailor training programs accordingly to address knowledge gaps and maximize learning outcomes. - Provide ongoing support and guidance to team members post-training, addressing any questions or concerns that may arise.   - Build and maintain strong relationships with team members, fostering a positive and supportive learning environment. - Collect feedback from trainees to continually improve training programs and materials Requirements - Genuine interest in teaching and educating people, with a passion for building relationships with those trained. - Proven experience in training and development, preferably in a technology or software-related field. - Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to convey complex concepts in a clear and concise manner. - Strong organizational skills, with the ability to manage multiple training initiatives simultaneously. - Flexibility and adaptability to accommodate varying learning styles and preferences. - Experience in the construction industry or familiarity with construction project management processes is a plus. - Must be fluent in either Kannada or Telegu or both

column2: BankKaro:? Founded in April 2021 by Swati Bhargava and Rohan Bhargava, BankKaro is the fintech subsidiary of CashKaro, backed by notable investors including Mr. Ratan Tata, Kalaari Capital, Affle, and Korea Investment Partners. BankKaro functions as a credit card and loan discovery platform, rewarding users for approved applications. Our customer-centric approach eliminates complexity and delivers the finest credit card and loan options to users. Our mission at BankKaro is to expand financial accessibility to millions of Indian customers. We recognize the demand among informed Indians for credit cards with exceptional reward points and benefits, as well as loans offering the lowest interest rates and maximum flexibility. To meet these demands, we've crafted a platform where you can uncover premier credit card and loan offers, access complimentary credit score checks, and exclusive products.BankKaro continues its rapid expansion and is constantly seeking exceptional, pioneering individuals who share our passion and commitment to realize our vision. This is an exciting moment to join our company and be a part of something truly extraordinary.  Job Description: ? Planning & Curating Training Content? - Extensively designing customized training courses - both recurring and as per TNI to enhance knowledge and required skills among targeted audience. Delivering Training Sessions -  Consistently imparting training sessions as required on weekly and monthly basis. Training Methodology -  On interim level, executing the sessions as per need of process from Classroom Trainings as CK New Joiner, Shadow in CRM OJT, CK Product Refreshers, allocated Quality Improvements CRM trainings followed by assessments. Post Training Connects -? Connecting with Trainees and their Reporting Managers to understand the learnings being executed to perform desired role. Training Effectiveness -  Ensuring to meet the goals for effective training, measurable through Training Feedback from Trainees and Trainees' Manager ensuring improvement in CSAT / Quality. Training Interventions & Performance Improvement -  Connecting with Leads and Managers, to identify core pulse and need of reason of any module followed by metrics of performance improvement. Must-Have Skills: Should have excellent understanding of end-to-end training process from TNI to effectiveness. Must possess excellent Interpersonal Skills. Should be able to independently design and recommend Training module content alongside Icebreakers and Warm-Sessions. Strong proficiency in variant Training Techniques from Classrooms or OJT or even 1-1 sessions. Excellent presentation and public speaking skills. Must have a strong understanding of Customer Support Process and the performance metrics like CSAT, NPS, AHT, FCR and CES. Good To Have -? Understanding or knowledge about e-commerce Customer Support. Know hacks about process automation at e-commerce products specifically for App / Website. Knowledge or passion towards LMS to automate Training process. Designing tutorials for customers or agents basis repeated queries to contribute to AHT and FCR. Solution driven to not only advise but execute to eliminate gaps for process. Why Join Us :? 1. Start-up Environment? - Work with a passionate and energetic team that is driven by hustle, comradeship, and togetherness. 2. Compensation & Benefits ? Best-in-class salaries to highly competitive ESOPs along with great learning work environment, we offer you a place full of opportunities to customize your career trajectory. 3. An Environment for Innovation -? We create a culture for innovation by giving an employee the prowess to create, make and innovate. 4. We've got you covered -  From medical insurance, well-defined policies to flexi WFH options, scrumptious lunch to some amazing learning and development sessions- we've got your back! 5. Cool Perks   Come and get to join us for in-house events, team outings, dinner catchups, and much more. Ensuring a Diverse and Inclusive workplace where we learn from each other is core to CK's value. CashKaro.com and EarnKaro.com are Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employers. column2: Position Overview:   As the Lead for Sales Force Effectiveness Training, you will play a pivotal role in enhancing the performance and capabilities of our sales team. You will be responsible for designing, implementing, and overseeing comprehensive training programs aimed at optimizing sales force effectiveness. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record in sales force effectiveness training within the pharmaceutical industry, along with strong leadership and communication skills. Responsibilities: Develop and implement training programs to enhance the effectiveness and performance of the sales force. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify training needs and develop targeted solutions. Design and deliver training modules covering sales techniques, product knowledge, market dynamics, and compliance regulations. Conduct ongoing assessments to measure the impact and effectiveness of training initiatives. Provide coaching and mentorship to sales managers and representatives to reinforce learning and drive continuous improvement. Stay updated on industry trends, best practices, and regulatory requirements related to sales force effectiveness training. Lead a team of trainers and coordinators to ensure seamless execution of training programs. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in science, pharma or a related field. Advanced degree preferred. 6-7 years of experience in sales force effectiveness training, preferably within the pharmaceutical industry/FMCG industry. Proven track record of designing and implementing successful training programs that drive measurable results. Strong understanding of sales methodologies, CRM systems, and pharmaceutical sales processes. Excellent leadership, communication, and interpersonal skills. Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced, dynamic environment and manage multiple priorities simultaneously. Experience leading a team is highly desirable.

column2: Sales Trainer   - SAAS Your   career   stage   will   be:   Your   department   will   be: Manager Customer Success Your   employment   type:   Where   will   you   be   working? Full-Time Bangalore India Are   you   passionate   about   solving   roadblocks   & challenges   faced   by   MSMEs   in   India MSMEs contribute significantly to Indias total GDP. 90% of Indias ~$1 Trillion Retail Market is controlled by MSMEs. Which means ~$900B worth of commerce flows through these ~60M MSMEs in the form of shops/kiosks/homes, scattered all over the country. We at Khatabook, have built a product that saves time of MSMEs by managing their credit, and creating transparency in cash flow, henceforth increasing trust with their consumers and that paved the path for us to become Indias fastest-growing fintech company. Why   work   with   us People are our biggest asset! At  Khatabook , every one of us is a dynamic superstar. We have carefully bred an ecosystem which hires nothing but incredibly and exceptionally talented people who can dream, collaborate, experiment, and break new ground. Were a strong team that looks out for each other. Your   role   We, at  Khatabook , are looking for a  Training   Manager-   SAAS  to identify and assessing training needs within our organization, developing training plans, and implementing various training methods to enhance our Field sales team?? skills and performance. What   would   you   do   at   Khatabook  Training and Development: Expertise in creating and delivering comprehensive sales training programs.  Curriculum Design: Ability to develop training curricula tailored to the needs of the sales team.  Support new hire onboarding: Assist in the onboarding process for new and on job training sales employees, helping them quickly integrate into their roles.  Monitor and evaluate progress: Regularly assess the effectiveness of training programs through evaluations, quizzes, and feedback, and make necessary adjustments for continuous improvement.  To ensure that right selling behavior, sales ethics and right sales practices are embedded through the training imparted in line with company standards and regulations.  To plan training calendar and ensure training coverage as per planned calendar & training needs & agreed flavor of the month.  Act as a Single Point of Contact for all training related issues  Visit our channel Partners on a regular basis to ensure that training needs are identified & trainings planned accordingly.  Identifying and addressing business challenges.  Collaborate with the Business/Zonal/Reginal Heads to lead scalable projects/ initiatives aimed at enhancing employee productivity and fungibility.  Facilitate collaborative, cross-functional design session. What   are   we   looking   for  Bachelor?? degree in education, Business, or related field.    6-8 years of experience in sales training or sales management.  Possess strong leadership qualities, work well in a team environment, and collaborate with different departments to achieve common training goals  Demonstrated flexibility to tailor training programs to meet the needs of various employee roles and adapt training content to changing business requirements.  A passion for personal and professional growth, staying updated with industry trends, new training techniques, and best practices.  Strong communication and presentation skills  In-depth knowledge of sales strategies and industry trends  Ability to measure performance, experience with building and developing teams. About   Khatabook We exist to empower India?? 60 Million strong MSMEs. Our users??motives, methodology, expectations and behaviour are significantly different from our own when they interact with the internet and technology ecosystem which makes it harder to build for them, to solve that. Our first offering ??is an Android App that has been downloaded over 10 crore+ times, which has resulted in having an active merchant base of over 9 million users. As more businesses are adopting digital for business than ever before, Khatabook?? goal can be summed up simply - Empowering merchants by simplifying their business by  Building a complete business management platform.  Providing the power of technology to an underserved segment.  Helping businesses to grow by providing them with ammunition of insights & digital reports.  Offering a financial services platform catering to the specific needs of the MSME space. We are an equal opportunity workplace. We expect your authentic, original selves at work always and stand against discrimination on the basis of caste, creed, gender, religion or background.

column2: Emidas infosystem pvt.ltd is looking for Customer Engagement Technical to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey      As a Customer Engagement Technical Specialist, you will be responsible for providing technical support and assistance to customers to enhance their overall experience with our products or services      Your primary duties and responsibilities will include:Technical Support: Serving as the primary point of contact for customers seeking technical assistance via phone, email, chat, or other communication channels      Providing prompt and effective resolution to technical issues, troubleshooting product-related problems, and guiding customers through the resolution process      Product Knowledge: Developing a deep understanding of the company's products or services, including their features, functionalities, and technical specifications      Keeping up-to-date with product updates, enhancements, and troubleshooting techniques to provide accurate and relevant assistance to customers      Customer Engagement: Engaging with customers proactively to address their technical needs, gather feedback, and ensure satisfaction with the company's offerings      Building rapport and fostering positive relationships with customers through clear communication, empathy, and professionalism      Training and Education: Conducting training sessions or webinars to educate customers on how to use products effectively, maximize their benefits, and troubleshoot common issues independently      Providing user guides, tutorials, and documentation to support customer learning and self-service      Escalation Management: Escalating complex technical issues or unresolved customer concerns to appropriate internal teams such as product development, engineering, or quality assurance      Collaborating with cross-functional teams to prioritize and expedite issue resolution while keeping customers informed of progress

column1: OPPO Mobiles is looking For Service Trainer
column2: Role & responsibilities   Design and develop comprehensive training programs for service staff, including customer service representatives, technical support specialists, and field technicians. Create training materials, manuals, guides, and e-learning modules tailored to various learning styles. Ensure training content is current, relevant, and aligned with the companys standards and industry best practices. Conduct training sessions in-person, virtually, and through e-learning platforms. Facilitate workshops, seminars, and one-on-one coaching sessions to enhance service skills and technical knowledge. Evaluate training effectiveness through assessments, feedback, and performance metrics. Maintain an in-depth understanding of mobile devices, operating systems, software applications, and industry trends. Provide hands-on training for troubleshooting, repairs, and customer interaction techniques. Stay updated on new product launches and updates to ensure training content remains current. Track and report on the progress and performance of trainees. Identify areas for improvement and recommend solutions to enhance training effectiveness. Collaborate with management to address training gaps and ensure continuous improvement. Work closely with product development, customer service, and technical support teams to align training with company objectives. Support the on boarding process for new employees by providing comprehensive training on products and services. Act as a resource for service staff, providing ongoing support and guidance. Ensure that all training programs meet the companys quality standards. Implement quality assurance measures to monitor the consistency and effectiveness of training delivery Preferred candidate profile     Education: Bachelors degree in Education, Training and Development, Information Technology, or a related field. Relevant certifications (e.g., CompTIA, Certified Technical Trainer) are a plus. Minimum of 2-7 years of experience in a training role within the mobile or technology industry. Proven track record in designing and delivering technical training programs. Experience with e-learning platforms and instructional design is highly desirable. Strong technical knowledge of mobile devices, operating systems, and software applications. Excellent communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills. Ability to simplify complex technical information for diverse audiences. Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite and training development software. Strong organizational and time management skills.   WORKING CONDITIONS: This position may require occasional travel to various training locations. Flexibility to work outside regular business hours as needed to accommodate training schedules. Perks and benefits   Good Hike on Existing salary PF + ESIC Benefits + Key Performance Incentive + T.A+ D.A Plus other Perks

column2: Objective: The trainer's role is to gracefully align participants with the company's inspiring vision and unwavering mission. By skillfully transferring knowledge, they amplify productivity, while engaging employees through engaging and diverse learning methods, complemented by recognition and rewards. As a catalyst for transformation, they ignite positive change, empowering participants to deliver an unparalleled customer experience to our esteemed guests  Roles and Responsibilities     Training Program Development: Designing and developing training programs and materials that align with the learning objectives and needs of the participants. This includes creating training modules, presentations, handouts, and other resources. Training Delivery: Conducting training sessions or workshops either in person, virtually, or through online platforms. Delivering training content effectively, engaging participants, and adapting the delivery style to meet the learning preferences of the audience. Knowledge Transfer: Transferring knowledge and skills to participants through effective communication, demonstrations, and practical exercises. Ensuring that the training content is clear, relevant, and easily understandable by the participants. Assessing Training Needs: Identifying the training needs of individuals or teams through assessments, surveys, or interviews. Analyzing performance gaps and designing training interventions to address those gaps. Learning Evaluation: Assessing the effectiveness of training programs by conducting evaluations, such as quizzes, tests, or surveys, to measure participants' learning outcomes. Collecting feedback and making improvements based on evaluation results. Individual Support and Coaching: Providing individual support and coaching to participants as needed. Addressing their questions, concerns, and providing guidance to reinforce learning and application in real-life scenarios. Training Administration: Handling administrative tasks related to training, such as scheduling sessions, managing training materials and resources, maintaining participant records, and coordinating logistics for training events. Professional Development: Keeping up to date with industry trends, best practices, and new training methodologies. Continuously developing personal skills and knowledge to enhance training effectiveness. Collaboration and Communication: Collaborating with other trainers, subject matter experts, and stakeholders to ensure training programs align with organizational goals and requirements. Communicating effectively with participants, supervisors, and management to provide progress updates and address any training-related issues. Training Evaluation and Improvement: Conducting post-training evaluations and analyzing feedback to assess the impact and effectiveness of training programs. Using this information to make improvements and adjustments to future training initiatives  Desired Candidate Profile     Subject Matter Expert: In-depth knowledge and expertise in the subject matter being taught, enabling trainer to deliver accurate and relevant information to participants. Strong Communication Skills: Excellent verbal and written communication skills to convey information clearly, engage participants, and adapt communication style to suit different audiences. Presentation and Facilitation Skills: The ability to deliver engaging presentations, facilitate discussions, and create an interactive learning environment that encourages participation and knowledge retention. Active Listening: Being attentive and actively listening to participants' questions, concerns, and feedback. Responding effectively and creating an inclusive learning environment. Adaptability: The capacity to adapt training methods, content, and delivery to meet the diverse learning styles, needs, and preferences of participants. Empathy and Patience: Demonstrating empathy towards participants' learning challenges, being patient in addressing their queries, and providing support throughout the learning process. Organizational and Time Management: Effectively planning and organizing training sessions, managing training materials, and ensuring timely delivery of content within the allocated time frame. Interpersonal Skills: Building rapport with participants, establishing a positive and respectful learning environment, and fostering collaborative relationships. Problem-Solving: Being able to identify and address challenges or obstacles that may arise during training sessions, adapting on the spot, and finding creative solutions. Evaluation and Feedback: The ability to assess learning outcomes, collect feedback, and evaluate the effectiveness of training programs. Using this information to continuously improve and enhance future training initiatives. Continuous Learning: A commitment to ongoing professional development, staying updated with industry trends, new technologies, and innovative training methodologies. A minimum of 5-8 years of professional experience in various roles, preferably with a strong emphasis on soft skills development  Interested can apply direct on hansari@greencellmobility.com
column11: Training, training programs, Soft Skills Training, Behavioral Training, Service Training, Customer Service Training, service trainer, presentation skills, Corporate Training, Training Management, communication skills

column2: Position Summary: The NetSuite?Education Consultant?means  having to work collaboratively with the customer to ensure that they  have the knowledge to achieve their business objectives at the highest  level of success. This is done by leading and conducting various  learning opportunities: Advising customers on learning strategies Delivering tailored end user training sessions Online Webinars Upskilling Partners Online Workshops The role of Education Consultant is primarily focused on  delivering advising sessions which are aimed to provide guidance and  support to the customer by matching training needs to eLearning  solutions in the learning platform, providing user adoption tools and  explanations for effective organization roll out, and developing custom  Learning Action Plans and strategy for proper execution of live end user  training events.? The Education Consultant is also tasked to design and deliver  high-quality, process-based tailored training that promotes NetSuite  best practices to multiple customers in various industries. They will  also deliver public webinars focused on enabling customers on beginner  and/or advanced topics to provide clarity and?guidance on how to  maximize NetSuite processes and functions. The Education Consultant collaborates with NetSuite  Professional Services implementation teams to assess customer training  needs, develop custom agendas and materials (written and eLearning  tutorials), and deliver quality training to ensure optimal user  adoption.?Education Consultants may deliver additional services such as  Train the Trainer, Pre-UAT Training, and Post Go-Live Support Training.? Training project team members, administrators and developers is  also an integral part of our charter and essential to customer success.  Public courses are taught using standard materials and taught using a  standard demo database. Dedicated sessions may be tailored to the need  of the client and may be taught using the customer environment. The ideal candidate possesses a passion for training, has  excellent communication skills, can deliver training sessions, can  develop learning and reference materials, demonstrates excellent  attention to detail, cares deeply about customer satisfaction, exhibits  strong project management skills and embraces change. Your Responsibilities: As an Education Consultant,?you will have the opportunity to make immediate contributions to the organization as you: Understand the NetSuite application in all functional areas as they relate to customer learning requirements Learn all relevant aspects of current and new product  rollouts to ensure ongoing improvement of product knowledge, training  and presentation skills, and technical knowledge Lead and conduct advising sessions to provide guidance and develop strategies to match and achieve customer business needs Deliver customer specific end-user training including  Pre-UAT, Train the Trainer, End User Training, and Go Live Support based  on their implementation project scope onsite and virtually Deliver webinars and webinar series general customer base Work in partnership with the customer to understand areas  where additional support may be required to reinforce their learning  needs? Recommend business best practices from a user adoption, training, and business management perspective Partner with Customer Success Project Managers and Functional  Consultants to develop and deliver user adoption and training plans for  customer implementations Incorporate learning industry best practices and techniques in daily engagements Apply expert knowledge of the NetSuite application to solve the customers business challenge. Create a change management and user adoption strategy Develop customer-specific end-user training and reference  materials (print and eLearning), leveraging NetSuite Universal Content  Library assets Assume full ownership for the success of multiple concurrent  customer training projects and deliver on time and on budget with the  flexibility to manage a changing schedule of differing complexities with  ease, grace, and some management oversight. Mentor others on delivery strategies and internal processes  related to job ownership and execution of the training. Provide  constructive feedback to the Mentees and provide insight on progress to  Manager Adhere to Education Services Delivery methods, processes,  procedures, and policies in the development and delivery of training  services Participate in the development of new offerings and  improvement to processes, providing feedback and suggestions to  education program management Preferred Qualifications: Minimum 2 years in the technology or training delivery industry 1+ years experience in a functional training role with  emphasis on technology and business process training development,  design, and delivery Bachelor's degree in Business Administration/Management,  Finance/Economics, Psychology, Human Resource Management, Education or  Liberal Arts Understanding of common industry standards as related to ERP  along with standard business practices as related to Accounting  (Accounts Receivable, Accounts Payable, General Ledger, Invoicing),  Sales Force Management, (Opportunity, Proposal, Sales Orders,  Forecasting, Territory Management and Quotas), Inventory Management  (Purchasing and Fulfillment) as well as support (Cases Management and  Territory Management). column2: We are seeking a talented and proactive Managed Services Associate (with Instructional Design background) to deliver top-notch service to our enterprise-level customers. As a part of our dedicated team, you will take charge of projects and handle administrative tasks on the Mindtickle platform, catering to our clients unique business needs.recreate existing customer content into bite-sized learning programs as per customer needs.            What s in it for you?      Manage administrative tasks of multiple customers and projects simultaneously while adhering to timeliness, quality and schedule.      Gain a comprehensive understanding of client requirements, ensure timely communication and updates to customers     Act as the primary point of contact for both client and internal team communications for high-priority projects.     Conduct thorough User Acceptance Testing (UAT) and audits before project handovers to clients.     Structure, chunk, and/or recreate existing customer content into material suitable for bite-sized learning.     Design and develop engaging content, primarily using tools like PowerPoint, Articulate Rise, Vyond, amongst others     Constantly learn and explore the Mindtickle platform, features and functionalities to discover more streamlined task execution methods.                       We d love to hear from you, if you:        Have Bachelor s degree with 2-4 years of experience in Managed Services or platform administration within an IT organization for a SaaS-based product/application.     Are a quick learner with the ability to grasp the intricacies of the Mindtickle platform and adapt to new technologies.     Have exceptional verbal, written, and presentation skills, with strong interpersonal communication abilities.      Have flair for writing and Interest in content of any kind - ranging from technical to frameworks on culture/values, policies and best practices.     Have working knowledge of Instructional Design, Curriculum Development or Content Creation     Have knowledge of fundamental MS Word, PPT, Excel (Advanced Excel knowledge is a plus).     Are familiarity with web development technologies (JavaScript, HTML, CSS) will be highly advantageous.     Have the ability to thrive under tight deadlines and manage multiple projects concurrently.     Have keen attention to detail and adeptness in comprehending problem statements.     Are a team player capable of collaborating with cross-functional teams to solve business and technical challenges.     Possess deep commitment to the accuracy of work and a strong focus on client satisfaction.     Possess a customer-centric and solution-oriented approach.     Have experience of working on a Learning Management Systems will be an added advantage.     Have familiarity with web development technologies (JavaScript, HTML, CSS) will be highly advantageous.

column2: As a Server Engineer Trainer, you will play a vital role in educating and developing our employees/students/clients in the field of server engineering. Your primary responsibility will be to design, create, and deliver server engineering training programs suitable for individuals with varying levels of experience, from beginners to seasoned professionals. You will work closely with our team to ensure that the training materials align with our organization s objectives and industry standards.          ?       Key Responsibilities:            Curriculum Development:    Develop comprehensive server engineering training modules and courses that cater to the specific needs of our target audience.        Instruction:    Conduct engaging and informative server engineering training sessions, workshops, or webinars, either in person or virtually.        Assessment:    Evaluate the progress and proficiency of participants through assignments, quizzes, and practical exercises to gauge their understanding and skill development.        Feedback:    Provide constructive feedback to participants and continually enhance training materials based on feedback and evolving industry trends.        Stay Current:    Stay updated with the latest developments in server engineering, hardware, and software to ensure training content remains current and relevant.        Documentation:    Maintain accurate records of training materials, attendance, and participant performance.        Support:    Offer guidance and support to participants outside of training sessions, addressing questions and providing additional resources as needed.        Qualifications        Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field (Masters degree preferred).      Proven experience as a server engineer with a deep understanding of server hardware, operating systems, and virtualization technologies.      Previous experience as a trainer or educator in server engineering or related fields.      Excellent communication and presentation skills.      Strong problem-solving skills.      Ability to adapt teaching methods to accommodate various learning styles and needs.      Familiarity with instructional design principles and methodologies.      Relevant certifications (eg, Microsoft Certified: Azure Administrator, CompTIA Server+) are a plus

column2: We are on the lookout for dedicated and proficient Artificial Intelligence Trainers to join our team in Tamil Nadu. Candidates should be fluent in both Tamil and English and must be prepared for extensive travel across the states districts, which is a vital requirement for this position. Guide students through AI fundamentals, fostering an environment that encourages learning and practical application.            Offer individualized support and mentorship, helping students understand and apply AI concepts in real-world scenarios. Travel within Tamil Nadu to various districts for on-site training sessions.            Handle all administrative tasks related to college visits, training delivery, report generation, and other tasks as needed from time to time.                Requirements        Experience in teaching or training, with a preference for those who have taught IT or computer science subjects.            Strong foundation in AI, with a background in Python programming being highly advantageous.            Proficiency in both Tamil and English, with strong spoken Tamil skills.            Excellent communication, presentation, and interpersonal abilities.            Passion for teaching and the capability to inspire and engage students.            Ability to adapt teaching methods to suit various learning styles and backgrounds.            Current knowledge of AI trends and practices.                  Must requirement:              Location: Candidates must be based in Tamil Nadu and willing to travel extensively. column2: We are seeking an enthusiastic and knowledgeable AI Course Trainer to provide comprehensive training and guidance to students interested in the field of artificial intelligence.      As an AI Course Trainer, you will be responsible for delivering high-quality educational content through    course conduction, fostering a dynamic learning environment, and supporting students in their AI education journey.          Key Responsibilities:          1. Curriculum Development:          Support in Developing and update course content and materials for various levels of AI courses.      Stay up-to-date with the latest AI trends and technologies to ensure the curriculu remains relevant.          2. Instruction:          Deliver engaging and effective AI training sessions, both in-person and online, to students of varying backgrounds and skill levels.      Provide clear explanations, demonstrations, and real-world examples to help students grasp AI concepts.          3. Student Support:          Offer one-on-one or group mentoring and support to help students with their coursework, projects, and assignments.      Encourage and motivate students to develop problem-solving skills and a deep understanding of AI.      To organize various activities for candidates to provide exposure on regular basis.      Guide the students as a mentor, showing them how to maximize the advantages of AI in their projects.          4. Assessments and Feedback:          Create assessments, quizzes, and assignments to evaluate students progress and comprehension.      Provide constructive feedback to help students improve their skills and knowledge.          5. Technology and Tools::          Familiarize students with AI development tools, libraries, and platforms, and assist them in hands-on projects.      Address technical challenges and troubleshoot issues that students encounter during their learning process.          6. Collaboration:          Collaborate with other instructors, department heads, and administrators to enhance the overall educational experience.      Contribute to the development of new AI courses and learning resources.      Organize guest faculty sessions periodically.      To network with local employers for expert sessions, future employment prospects, etc.          7. Administrative Tasks:          Maintain accurate records of student performance and attendance.      Assist in managing course schedules, enrolment, and resources as needed.      To facilitate the project team in mobilization process and assessment for enrolment.      Generating reports and presenting information to Project Manager.      Support Employment related activities for the project.      To maintain and keep record of candidates attendance.          7. Administrative Tasks:          Bachelors degree in a relevant field (AI, computer science, data science, etc.). A masters or Ph.D. is a plus.      Strong understanding of AI concepts, machine learning, deep learning, and related technologies.      Prior teaching or training experience is preferred.      Proficiency in programming languages commonly used in AI, such as Python, Tensor Flow, and Py Torch.      Excellent communication and presentation skills.      Patient, approachable, and passionate about educating and mentoring students.      Ability to adapt to different learning styles and skill levels.
